reviews.comments: She is a crazy diva, don't take this class!
This is the best class I've ever taken. Jen is the best teacher ever!
Best. Class. Ever. I love the USA!
Interesting course but not for people who don't like reading the textbook.

Fun class overall, but if you are looking for an easy bacc core class DO NOT TAKE THIS!
Pretty challenging course but the TAs and professor are very helpful and caring.
You won't pass this class unless you read the texbook, not an easy bacc core.
Awesome class. Awesome professor. Good for chemistry lovers!
Class has weekly quizzes but if you study you'll be fine.
This class is about the plowing. Enough said.
This class is a fun discussion about technology.  You have to write a few papers but its not to bad! Rob is cool!
